title: How a Rare Disorder Makes People See Monsters
excerpt: A mysterious neurological condition makes faces look grotesque—and sheds new light on the inner workings of the brain.

title: Visual perception improves in the blink of an eye
excerpt: Blinking—long considered a problem the brain must overcome to produce seamless vision—may actually be more of a feature than a bug, new research suggests.

title: I Know the Secret to the Quiet Mind. I Wish I’d Never Learned It.
excerpt: Of all the injuries we suffered, mine is the worst. My brain injury has shaken my confidence in my own personality, my own existence.
